refnamediv.refpurpose: Channelization: frequency multiplexing of m input signals into a single signal (but with bandwidth multiplied by m)

listitem.para: input matrix, size [n x m], with n: n samples / channel, and m: number of channels. Each column of X is a different signal. The number of columns (m) is the number of channels.
